name: Hi im Blockster!-Early Access 2!
description:
Hi my name is blockster!

Some dudes want to use me for their construction, but i think that´s boring.

Sooooo........ You just need your finger (or mouse) to help me!

This game rebuilds itself for a funny and enjoyable challenge! So be prepared there will be a surprise or two....

For the Gdevelop GameJam.

Made in Gdevelop.

Early Access Number2!

I forgot to add a restart button so i quickly made it!
